iana.template_text:
(registered 2024-08-29, last updated 2024-09-02)

Type name: application

Subtype name: trust-chain+json

Required parameters: n/a

Optional parameters: n/a

Encoding considerations: binary; A Trust Chain is a JSON array of JWTs; JWT values are encoded as a series of base64url-encoded values (some of which may be the empty string) separated by period ('.') characters.

Security considerations: See Section 16 of OpenID Federation 1.0 <https://openid.net/specs/openid-federation-1_0.html>

Interoperability considerations: n/a

Published specification: Section 15.4 of OpenID Federation 1.0 <https://openid.net/specs/openid-federation-1_0.html>

Applications that use this media type: Applications that use OpenID Federation 1.0 <https://openid.net/specs/openid-federation-1_0.html>

Fragment identifier considerations: n/a

Additional information:

Magic number(s): n/a

File extension(s): n/a

Macintosh file type code(s): n/a

Person & email address to contact for further information:

Michael B. Jones, michael_b_jones&hotmail.com

Intended usage: COMMON

Restrictions on usage: none

Author: Michael B. Jones, michael_b_jones&hotmail.com

Change controller: OpenID Foundation Artifact Binding Working Group - openid-specs-ab&lists.openid.net
